channel.title: Git on Liuyu's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Liuyu's blog

item.title: git_tag
item.description: 本地仓库打tag 本地仓库打标签可以用附注标签或者轻量标签 然后更新远端 附注标签 git tag -a V3.0.1 -m "V3.0.3" # git tag -a <tag-name> -m "..." 轻量标签 git tag V3.0.1 # git tag <tag-name> 更新远端 git push origin V3.0.1
